# Interlude VI: The Canvas of the Void {.unnumbered}

> "Boredom is the only thing that cannot be monetized. It is the only true act of rebellion in a world that demands your attention. Protect your boredom."
> 
> — *The Reverse Maven*

The interface has consumed the day. Now, we design the room. We will explore the architecture of blandness and the art of monotony—the physical embodiment of the spiritual void we have curated.
